wiki.summary: “Bandit” serves as the lead single of Don Toliver’s newly-envisioned fourth studio album, HARDSTONE PSYCHO. Over a pitched up Tame Impala sample, Don gives a vivid glimpse into his exotic lifestyle, comparable to that of bikers which inspired his clothing brand HARDSTONE. The track was debuted at the Europe leg of his Love Sick tour in 2023, . On February 6, 2024, Don announced the single’s release via a story on his alternate Instagram account. Read more on Last.fm.
wiki.content: “Bandit” serves as the lead single of Don Toliver’s newly-envisioned fourth studio album, HARDSTONE PSYCHO. Over a pitched up Tame Impala sample, Don gives a vivid glimpse into his exotic lifestyle, comparable to that of bikers which inspired his clothing brand HARDSTONE. The track was debuted at the Europe leg of his Love Sick tour in 2023, . On February 6, 2024, Don announced the single’s release via a story on his alternate Instagram account. The music video ends with Don revealing his fiancée Kali Uchis‘ pregnancy simultaneously previewing the next single in promotion of HARDSTONE PSYCHO, “Deep in the Water.” Read more on Last.fm.
